sentences.sentence: CCNDFS leads to a lot of most important and philologically valuable documentary films.
sentences.translation: 中央新闻纪录电影制片厂制作了最重要、最具有语言学价值的新闻纪录片。

sentences.sentence: CCNDFS plays an authoritative role on film production of state momentous movement and historic event, which leads to a lot of most important and philologically valuable documentary films.
sentences.translation: 中央新闻纪录电影制片厂，在涉及共和国的重大活动、历史事件等方面具有权威的拍摄地位，诞生了大量共和国历史上最重要、最具有文献价值的新闻纪录片。
